function.name: mode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to change the mode or course of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

room.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the SmartThings device that needs to change mode or course.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to change mode or course.

mode.description: The mode that the SmartThings device should switch to.

temperature.description: The temperature setting for the SmartThings device.

temperatureUnit.description: The unit of temperature for the SmartThings device.

duration.description: The duration for the mode or course change.

weight.description: The weight setting for the SmartThings device.

weightUnit.description: The unit of weight for the SmartThings device.
